Class ReviewerHomePage

java.lang.Object
application.ReviewerHomePage
public class ReviewerHomePage extends Object
This page displays the reviewer interface with ability to view questions, provide answers, and add reviews.

    • showAnswersDialog

      private void showAnswersDialog(Question question, User user)
      Displays a dialog showing answers for a specific question.
      Parameters:
      question - The question whose answers are being displayed.
      user - The current user viewing the answers.
